mapper.insert:
insert into cp_tcpar ( cpar_cpar, cpar_usua, cpar_tpar, cpar_observ, cpar_ecpar, cpar_fcrea, cpar_fini, cpar_ffin, cpar_arun, cpar_ibsc, cpar_arun_cta, cpar_ibsc_cta
) values ( #{cpar_cpar}, #{cpar_usua}, #{cpar_tpar}, #{cpar_observ}, #{cpar_ecpar}, now(), #{cpar_fini}, #{cpar_ffin}, #{cpar_arun}, #{cpar_ibsc}, #{cpar_arun_cta}, #{cpar_ibsc_cta} )

insert into cp_tdcpar ( dcpar_cpar, dcpar_id_reg_orig, dcpar_fuente, dcpar_freca_norm, dcpar_freca_orig, dcpar_treca_norm, dcpar_treca_orig, dcpar_ofic_norm, dcpar_ofic_orig, dcpar_referencia, dcpar_observ, dcpar_valor, dcpar_fcrea
) values ( #{dcpar_cpar}, #{dcpar_id_reg_orig}, #{dcpar_fuente}, #{dcpar_freca_norm}, #{dcpar_freca_orig}, #{dcpar_treca_norm}, #{dcpar_treca_orig}, #{dcpar_ofic_norm}, #{dcpar_ofic_orig}, #{dcpar_referencia}, #{dcpar_observ}, #{dcpar_valor}, now() )
mapper.select: select d.* from cp_tdcpar d, cp_tcpar where dcpar_cpar = #{cpar_cpar} and dcpar_cpar = cpar_cpar and dcpar_freca_norm between cpar_fini and cpar_ffin order by dcpar_freca_norm asc, dcpar_treca_norm asc, dcpar_valor asc, dcpar_ofic_norm asc, dcpar_fuente asc

select * from ( select dcpar_cpar, dcpar_fuente, dcpar_treca_norm, sum(dcpar_valor) dcpar_valor, count(1) dcpar_cantidad from cp_tdcpar, cp_tcpar where dcpar_cpar = #{cpar_cpar} and dcpar_cpar = cpar_cpar and dcpar_freca_norm between cpar_fini and cpar_ffin group by dcpar_cpar, dcpar_fuente, dcpar_treca_norm ) order by dcpar_treca_norm asc, dcpar_fuente asc
